00068 typedef struct ec_eoe ec_eoe_t; 
00076 struct ec_eoe
00077 {
00078     struct list_head list; 
00079     ec_slave_t *slave;

00094     unsigned int rx_idle; 
00096     struct list_head tx_queue;
